text: To find out which dog breed is based in Switzerland, I will look into the origins of both Bernese Mountain Dog and Drentse Patrijshond.
According to my knowledge about dog breeds, Bernese Mountain Dog hails from the Swiss Alps.
On the other hand, Drentse Patrijshond is a Dutch breed, not typically associated with Switzerland.
Therefore, the Bernese Mountain Dog is the dog breed based in Switzerland.
